page.title: 19News
page.content: the following are examples of local news in a typical week. the penyfford community council is arranging a public meeting in the village to organise a concerted effort to raise money for the clwyd hospitals body scanner appeal. Councillors and members of the public are invited to find sponsors for a 10 mile walk in aid of the fund.Penyffordd's target is Â£5.885 but at least 20% has already been raised as a result of individual efforts. The scout group raised Â£78.50 by a paper collection on June 29th. The money is for group funds. British Rail has assured Penyffordd Community Council that it is to make improvents in the approach road to the railway station.
